resources.string: "Please follow instructions below to access the device storage from PC"
Connect to Wi-Fi before starting the service.
Start the service to access files from PC.
Enter the above address in a web browser on PC.
Do you want to uninstall following apps?
%s already exists. Do you want to overwrite?
Target folder is a subfolder of the source folder.
Target is the same as the source.
There is already a folder with the same name as the source file name.
There is already a file with the same name as the source folder name.
Cache files are temporary files that are stored by your apps
This will clear cache files for all apps.
Port %d is in use. Please choose a different number.
Please allow the app to access the SD card first by following instructions below.
Please allow the app to access the USB storage first by following instructions below.
1. Tap the menu button(☰) in the top left corner.
2. Tap the SD card in the side menu
2. Tap the USB storage in the side menu
3. Tap the select button at the bottom
The selected folder is not the root of the SD card. Please try again.
The selected storage is not the SD card. Please try again.
You need to allow access to the SD card for the operation.
The selected folder is not the root of the USB storage. Please try again.
The selected storage is not the USB storage. Please try again.
You need to allow access to the USB storage for the operation.
The selected apps include system apps.
If you like this app, please rate us 5 stars on Google Play.
Press back button again to exit
There is not enough space on your %s
